title: Revenue And Profit Aren't Mutually Exclusive With Joe Lusardi, Curaleaf CEO
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Joe Lusardi is President & CEO of Curaleaf, a vertically integrated multi-state cannabis operator in the U.S. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss the growth trajectory of the industry, vertical integration as a means to control supply and quality of product. They also cover Curaleaf's recent big-name acquisitions, the need to focus on developing brands and why their in-depth earnings call is a point of differentiation in the industry. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
